DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gain a better understanding of the effects of exercise and cognitive training on improving brain function in healthy older adults who may be at risk for developing Alzheimer's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Exercise and Cognitive Training on Cognitive Function in Older Adults
DOC.criteria: First or Seconddegree relative of someone with Alzheimer's Disease Not currently engaging in regular exercise Able to undergo an MRI Fluent in English Neurological illnesses/conditions Medical illness/conditions that may affect brain function Any unstable or severe cardiovascular disease or asthmatic condition Severe depressive symptoms Inability to walk unassisted
